cleaned_text: Intention Can Change Your Life For people who want to improve their health, vitality and mental clarity, Crystal Being Wellness, LLC offers individuals holistic health services that empower clients to take back control over their health and life goals. Unlike group classes, Crystal Being Wellness offers individual sessions specifically tailored to the client's needs using [Yoga Therapy](https://www.crystalbeingwellness.com/healing/yoga-therapy/), [Ayurveda](https://www.crystalbeingwellness.com/healing/ayurveda/), [Reiki](https://www.crystalbeingwellness.com/healing/reiki/) and Yoga Wellness Coaching to incorporate the mind, body and spirit for a holistic approach to healing. Having personally found transformation through these teachings, Joy is passionate about sharing this knowledge with individuals who are seeking change.
